notesStmt.note: Running title: The complaynt of Scotland.
Variously attributed to Wedderburn and Sir David Lindsay--British Museum Catalog.
Place and date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Signatures: A⁸(-A1) B-C⁸ D⁸(D4 + X22) E⁸(-E5-7) F⁸(-F8) G⁸(-G1-4) H⁸ I⁸(-I8) K⁸(-K1-2) L-O⁸ P⁸(-P7-8) Q⁸(-Q1-5) R⁸ S⁸(-S1).
Imperfect: lacking t.p.; numerous signatures either lacking or cancelled; cropped and torn, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
